borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed single storey rear extension for reasons of size, scale, design and sitting will appear <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="disproportionalty" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1klbjrmvewikoa">disproportionately</span> large and at odds with the character and <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="apperance" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1klbjb3s04i1v9">appearance</span> of the dwelling given it will increase the depth of the property by more than half its original depth. Likewise, for reasons of design the proposed single storey side extension will introduce a new roof design which fails to respect and reflect the built form of the host dwelling. Overall, the proposed development <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="consitutes" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1kqqg76g8gi98q">constitutes</span> and uncharacteristic and unsympathetic addition to the <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="dwellinghouse" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1kqqf97cnj7izi">dwellinghouse</span> harmful to the character and <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="apperance" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1kqqf6on2bbte3">appearance</span> of the street scene, dwelling, terrace row and the surrounding local area. The proposal is considered unacceptable and contrary to the <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="devleopment" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1kri6h0aio4wx5">development</span> policies.&nbsp;<br></p>

<p>The proposed single storey rear extension for reasons of size, scale, mass, bulk and sitting will result in unacceptable levels of overshadowing and the material loss of daylight, outlook and privacy to the rear garden and habitable rooms of&nbsp;53 <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="Langhorne" data-wsc-lang="en_GB" data-wsc-id="kpr1ks9snvcs70gvn">Langhorne</span> Road, harmful to their standard of living. The proposal therefore constitutes overbearing and unneighbourly development, as such it is considered unacceptable and contrary to the development polices.<br></p>
description: Construction of a single storey side and rear extension including 2 roof lights on the flat roof
